item.title: Life
item.description: Overview Life is a state of being characterised by the presence of a soul and an animate body. Beings which are alive are known as living beings or essents.

item.title: Minikin
item.description: Overview Minikin (spp. Sciurus sapiens) are a species of small rodents native to the 2nd realm. They are anthropoid, arboreal omnivores descended from the European Red Squirrel.

item.title: Woolly Hogs
item.description: Overview Woolly Hogs are a group of swine native to Tseireph and the southwestern continent, domesticated by the Sarvarans. They are known for their distinctive woolly coats, which are often harvested and turned into yarn or thread.
